sqlQuery.name: Awstats
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, unique_visitors, visits, page_data_requests, avg_visit_duration, bandwidth_gb, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project,unique_visitors,visits,page_data_requests,avg_visit_duration,bandwidth_gb,start_date,end_date FROM METRICS.AWSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ +1 ) ORDER BY page_data_requests desc

sqlQuery.name: LoginStats
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, unique_logins, newly_registered, newly_registered_notLogin, total_registered, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, unique_logins, newly_registered, newly_registered_notLogin, total_registered, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.LOGINSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY newly_registered desc

sqlQuery.name: PageViewStats
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, registered_users_count, registered_page_count, guest_users_count, guest_page_count, registered_IP_count, guest_IP_count, guest_users_regPage_pct, guest_IP_regPage_pct, guest_users_regPage_newly_registered_pct, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, registered_users_count, registered_page_count, guest_users_count, guest_page_count, registered_IP_count, guest_IP_count, guest_users_regPage_pct, guest_IP_regPage_pct, guest_users_regPage_newly_registered_pct, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.PAGEVIEWSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY registered_page_count desc

sqlQuery.name: RecordPageViewStats
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, url_segment, count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, url_segment, count, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.RECORDPAGEVIEWSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY count desc

sqlQuery.name: UserDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, dataset_type, total_complete, total_incomplete, new_complete, new_incomplete, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, dataset_type, total_complete, total_incomplete, new_complete, new_incomplete, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.USERDATASETSSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdNoPortalSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY new_complete desc

sqlQuery.name: OrgPageViewMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, organism, is_reference, count, org_project, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT ovs.project_id as project, organism, IS_REFERENCE_STRAIN as is_reference, oa.project_id as org_project, count, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.ORGANISMVIEWSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ ovs LEFT OUTER JOIN apidbtuning.organismattributes oa ON ovs.organism = oa.ORGANISM_NAME WHERE ovs.project_id in ( $$projectIdNoAllSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 UNION SELECT ovs.project_id as project, organism, IS_REFERENCE_STRAIN as is_reference, oa.project_id as org_project, count, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.ORGANISMVIEWSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ ovs LEFT OUTER JOIN apidbtuning.organismattributes oa ON ovs.organism = oa.ORGANISM_NAME WHERE ovs.project_id = 'Unknown' AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY count desc

sqlQuery.name: OrgParamCountMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, number_of_organisms, steps_count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, number_of_organisms, steps_count, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.ORGANISMSPERSTEP@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 AND number_of_organisms >= $$org_count.min$$ AND number_of_organisms <= $$org_count.max$$ ) ORDER BY steps_count desc

sqlQuery.name: OrgParamNameMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, organism, is_reference, steps_count, org_project, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT ovs.project_id as project, ovs.organism, IS_REFERENCE_STRAIN as is_reference, steps_count, oa.project_id as org_project, start_date, end_date FROM METRICS.STEPSPERORGANISM@USER_DBLINK@ ovs LEFT OUTER JOIN apidbtuning.organismattributes oa ON ovs.organism = oa.ORGANISM_NAME WHERE ovs.project_id in ( $$projectIdNoAllSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY steps_count desc

sqlQuery.name: GenePageTableMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project_id in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project_id end as project_id, table_name, count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id,RECORD_CLASS_URL_SEGMENT as record_class,table_name,count,start_date,end_date FROM METRICS.GENEPAGETABLESTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 AND project_id in ( $$projectIdNoPortalSelect$$ ) ) ORDER BY count desc

sqlQuery.name: ToolMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, tool,count,to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project,tool,count,start_date,end_date FROM METRICS.TOOLSSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY count desc

sqlQuery.name: SearchMetrics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT to_char(rownum) as source_id, CASE when project in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project end as project_id, record_name, singlesearch_name as search_name, steps_count, to_char(start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM ( SELECT project_id as project, steps_count, start_date, end_date, SUBSTR(search_name, 1, INSTR(search_name, '.')-1) AS record_name, SUBSTR(search_name, INSTR(search_name, '.')+1) AS singlesearch_name FROM METRICS.SEARCHESSTATS@USER_DBLINK@ WHERE project_id in ( $$projectIdSelect$$ ) AND steps_count >= $$step_count.min$$ AND steps_count <= $$step_count.max$$ AND start_date >= $$date.min$$ AND end_date <= $$date.max$$ + 1 ) ORDER BY steps_count desc
